message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I believe it has a lot of potential and I'm willing to offer it to you for $850000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on a unique item, and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $600000. I'm willing to compromise, though. I can offer you the product for $725000. This is a fair price considering the product's value and potential. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $725000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $675000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not quite ready to give up on my original price. I can offer you the product for $750000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value I've already shown you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $750000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $700000. Can we meet at this price?

I understand your hesitation, Bob, but I'm not ready to give up on the value of the product. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer you the product for $725000. This is as close to your target as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $725000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $680000. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $725000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to make one final offer: $722500. This is my last concession. What do you think?

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $722500. I'm thinking more along the lines of $690000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
